articles.title: UFC fight between lightweights Donald Cerrone and Joe Lauzon canceled again
articles.description: A non-weight-cut-related medical issue for Joe Lauzon has led to the second straight, fight-day cancelation of a UFC lightweight showdown with Donald Cerrone.
articles.content:
The fight between a pair of UFC lightweight luminaries seems to be cursed.

articles.title: Pete Nance transferring to North Carolina from Northwestern
articles.description: North Carolina has landed transfer Pete Nance, who averaged 14.6 points, 6.5 rebounds and 2.7 assists per game for Northwestern last season.
articles.content:

articles.title: Naomi Osaka withdraws from Wimbledon, had expressed doubt about playing
articles.description: Naomi Osaka has withdrawn from Wimbledon, citing an Achilles injury and after expressing doubt about playing the Grand Slam following the removal of ranking points.
articles.content:
Four-time Grand Slam champion Naomi Osaka has withdrawn from Wimbledon.

articles.title: Chicago Cubs end 10-game skid while halting Atlanta Braves' 14-game win streak
articles.description: The Cubs became the first team in 23 years to stop a losing streak of 10 or more game while ending an opponent's winning streak of at least 10 games, beating the Braves 1-0 Friday to halt Atlanta's majors-best 14-game run.

articles.description: Former NASCAR driver Clint Bowyer struck and killed a pedestrian on a highway in Missouri earlier this month, police said. Bowyer showed no signs of impairment at the time of the accident.
